name: Colours;said
description:
The game takes less than ten minutes to finish and explains everything better than this description so what are you still reading this for?

Experimental visual novel made for NaNoRenO 2016

On an island with the person dearest to you, anything can happen

Features

  • almost 2000 words
  • 5 branches
  • plot twists
  • spinning

Contains some strong language and blood. Anything else might be implied more or less subtly. Might cause motion sickness in some branches.
